data.title: Hajira Photo Gallery by Gharib Hanif at pbase.com
data.text:
Salam to all of my Brothers. When we far away from our native land, we miss that, then we plan to go back but we indulge ourselves in works that our life pass even we unable to go back, my own experience revealed that we pass a life full of slavery in foreign countries, every moment we miss our native land, want to go back, looking with lusty eyes who still there. But then we suddenly become solemn that how we tell people who day & nights trying to get out of there & want to plunge in salvage life. There is nothing in abroad my countrymen just live there & try to settle there. Otherwise you will cry no one listen u & u get tired of entreating. Love my Hajira, missing a lot & every moment.Sagheer Sahib AOA. I wrote comments few days back but did not appear when I re-checked. Hence, I am going to address you again briefly.I was shocked to know that Babu Sb has passed away. He was the brother of one of my aunt(Mami).May God rest his Soul in peace.You have lost your parents and so have I in the same order as of your parents.My father died in 2007 n the dear mother died recently in Oct,2011. May almighty Allah grant eternal peace in the life hereafter to all deceased muslims including yours n my parents, Aamin.Now coming to the state of our neglected people. Yes you are right that we must undertake from our candidates before casting our vote for them. However,I have reservation for the outsider parties.They must not be allowed todo activities in AJK. They have made hell of Pakistan and are training their robots to do the same with the people in AJK also.May Allah save our people from their evil.I thank you for immediate response n Khuda Hafiz.Mohetram Abdul Qayyum Khan Sahib AOA

These are the problems faced by our people but some problems are self created

if our people use their voting power and pressurize the candidates who want to contest

the election before elections and put their demands before him and ask him to fulfill these demands before polling then I think he can do something to ease their problems otherwise there is no solution except any honest person win the election

from Karachi to Muzaffarabad looters & dacoos are our rulers so we can ,nt do anything only pray to Almighty ALLAH to show the right way to these looters.

I am in Karachi since 1970 my age is 56 years you are very right I am son of Qazi Najamuddin(late) father died in 1996 mother died in 2008 now I have no one to pray for me . My elder brother Abbas Qureshi retired from PIA service 8 years B4 . I have 4 sons only the elder one is married and No.2 completed BBA and working in travelling agency 3rd one is studying in B.com final 4th is studying in 10th class

I think you very well know about Babu Hassan Sb (late) of Paandi he died 3 mnth B4

I go to Azad Kashmir Phagwati every year in the month of June/July I have 33 years

in PIA . this is my introduction you know in Hajira Bazar Soofi Khadim Hussain Sb & Ghalab Din Sb are very close to us.

I pray to ALLAH always guide & guard you

With Best wishes

Sagheer Qureshi 0300-2428076

Thanks Sagheer Qureshi Sb for responding on my comments.I admire your concern for poor and most neglected people of our area. In fact I was frustated not because of the deteriorating situation of our area only but also because of least concern from our educated people towards this grave situation. However,your comments encouraged me and I hope that the day is not very far away when this beautiful area of ours will be developped not by our so called leaders but by the common people ot the land themselve. Having said so, I come to my first teacher (late) who was your cousin.I really have great regards for his soul and you are lucky to be part of such a respectable family.In you next comment, kindly introduce yourself in a bit detail. Are you son of Qazi Najja. How old are you and since how long you hve been residing in Karachi.How many children you have and how old are they.I have three sons and two daughters. All of them have completed their education except the last daughter who is about to comlete her LLM. I pray for eternal peace for the soul of deceased Qazi Sahib and let us pray to Almighty Allah for enabling us to resolve our problems ouselves instead of waiting for so called leaders. Pay comlements to your family. Regards to all Kashmiries whereever they are. Allah Hafiz.Mob.0336-5199336Abdul Qayyum Sahib AOA

I belong to Phagwati Khas and (Late) Qazi Baddaruddin Sahib was my cousin

you remarks must have reached to his soul you are 100% right that this is 4th term

of Sardar Ghulam Sadiq Khan but as usual you can see and observe that no development work is going on. The Middle school Phagwati is still middle since 35 years

and Girls primary school is still primary since 30 years the roads are badly damaged and no one is looking in it. there is no health centre in Akramabad, Chatrora or Phagwati so we have no comments for our MLA he should be himself looked in to his areas otherwise he will loose next elections. Please pray for him to pay attention on these basic issues.

I am currently at Karachi working with PIA but I have great love for Azad Kashmir

especially Hajira, Phagwati .

Best of luck & Best wishes to all .

Qazi Sagheer QureshiGharib Hanif, I wish that we could have a sincere leader like you who may do some good for our people.You have put up trmendous efforts in providing us a plateform to express our viws regarding beutiful but most neglected part of our country. It is pity that our leadership is dishonest to its own people. We have corruption in almost all public sector institutions, whether it may be health, education, judiciary,police or communication etc. I tell you one example of a school built by our elders on self help basis in Chatrora Phagwatti back somewhere in 1955-56. A teacher named Qazi Budrud Din late was deployed for teaching.I was one of the student who were enrolled on its opening ceremony. The credit of this school goes to all the poor people of that time in Chatrora,however, two of these people named Haji Subedar Diwan Ali Khan and Haji N/Sub Shahab-ud-Din Khan played the pivotal role in setting up this institution.I was one of those boys who passed their fifth class from this school in the year 1961. Later on, I studied in Faisalabad and Joined the government service. Now I have retired From Service after attaining the age of 60 years. My comment has gone too lengthy but what I wanted to explain that my old school was later converted to a girls school by my father somewhere in 1966 and again a private teacher was employed to teach.The government did not recognised it as a boys school,however it was recognised as a girl school in 1977 and a teacher was provided. Unluckily the school was not looked after and its building was not consrructed by government. Now after about 55 years since it started there is no building. The original building has been sold out inclding stones used in constructing it.It is stated that government has approved money for its reconsruction but no job has been started instead some of the very old trees near school have also been sold out. Since more than a year children are studying in my cousins house whose wife is also a teacher of this poor school. The school constructed by our poor elders have been sold out without eracting an alternate building which reflects one of the many curruptions of AJK Governments. The MLA of our constituancy Mr Ghulam Sadiq has been elected as speaker of Assembly but he also did not pay any attention towards this grave situation. I urge upon the honourable speaker to resolve this problem immediately before it is too late. This example shows that after more than 55 years the original school built on self help basis has been turned by our inefficient and currupt government into nothing instead of turning into a university. I am Sagheer Qureshi from Hajira Phagwati Khass now at Karachi due to Service

My younger brother ENGR> Adeel Qazi s comments that we want freedom of Entire Kashmir

My Bro. as you know in this global village how we could mantain our Independence you know what is the position of An independent Islamic republic Of Pakistan from 2 may/2011.

There are so many white elephants and black wolves arround us and they can not afford that we get independence so you have to need a strong leadership from both sides of kashmir now a days all are looters in our leadership base camp of freedom is changed in base camp of corruption and the otherside all are getting funds from many sources and they are passing their lives with luxries and lavish. so 1st you have to struggle for a strong leadership and you have to throwout all these looters then you will able to think about the independence of Kashmir

Pray to ALLAH that he will give our coming generation the freedom of Kashmir

Best Wishes to all Kashmiries especially belong to Hajira.

Sagheer Qureshi Karachi 0300-2428076Dear All Commentors

You people appreciate to Mr. Gharib Hanif on this excellent work but you people have to remind

the Rulers of AJK about their responsibilities. Basically this is the job of Government of AJK

to introduce the Kashmir in entire world because they have all the powers , finance and other

elements which can be supportive to introduce the sights AJK but they are sleeping in Kashmir House they have no interests with AJK they are taking interest in the looting of public money due to this they are defacing the Kashmir as you know they are looting and eating development budget no communication facilities in AJK you can analyse about all the roads from Muzaffarabad to Tetri Note from Azad Patan to Hajira via Trarkhel from Rawalakot to Trarkhel , Trarkhel to Jandali KhaiGala to Toli Peer nobody can travel smoothly all road are destroyed No Government Official taken the notice Allah in Choroo Aor Dacoo say kashmir ki jan Bachay takay yea area kuch develop ho sakay AAmin long live Gharib Hanif and long live

Azad Jammu & Kashmir

Best wishes to all brothers

Sagheer Qureshi sagheer_qureshipk@yahoo.com

0300242076I am Sagheer Qureshi belong from Phagwati Hajira currently residing at Karachi working in PIA since 1978 many times I have appreciated the excellent job done by Hanif Sahib this is a great job least the distance between people of Azad Kashmir. This is the responsibility of Kashmiri

Politicians but they are only looting the people s' money and not done anything for the people.

we can also see the photo gallaries of Indian held kashmir through the efforts of Hanif Bhai. I have got my education up to middle from High School Hajira and after that I came to Karachi

I love to Pakistan but deeply love to my Kashmir and heartly love to Hajire . I have visited almost all European countries and more than 30 times to UK and still I have the visa of UK up

to 2013 but I never seen the beautiful place like my kashmir.

ALLAH bless on Gharib Hanif & his family. Hanif Bhai please post some pics of villages PHAGWATI, HOD nd DAWARANDI

Salam to All Kashmiris in Azad Kashmir, Indian Held Kashmir & all over the World.

With Best Wishes

Sagheer Qureshi
